name: music
summary: Queue and control music in any voice channel.
description: Up to 49 concurrent sessions — one per voice channel, running simultaneously across the server. Play tracks from YouTube, Spotify, or SoundCloud by search or URL. Full queue management, looping, shuffle, volume control, lyrics, and seeking. Backed by the Agent Pool for maximum uptime.

subcommandsRich.name: play
subcommandsRich.desc: Search or URL — YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud

subcommandsRich.name: skip
subcommandsRich.desc: Skip the current track

subcommandsRich.name: pause
subcommandsRich.desc: Pause playback

subcommandsRich.name: resume
subcommandsRich.desc: Resume paused playback

subcommandsRich.name: stop
subcommandsRich.desc: Stop and clear the queue

subcommandsRich.name: now
subcommandsRich.desc: Show what's currently playing

subcommandsRich.name: queue
subcommandsRich.desc: Display the full queue

subcommandsRich.name: remove
subcommandsRich.desc: Remove a specific track from the queue

subcommandsRich.name: volume
subcommandsRich.desc: Set playback volume (0–100)

subcommandsRich.name: loop
subcommandsRich.desc: Loop the current track or entire queue

subcommandsRich.name: shuffle
subcommandsRich.desc: Shuffle the queue randomly

subcommandsRich.name: seek
subcommandsRich.desc: Jump to a timestamp in the current track

subcommandsRich.name: lyrics
subcommandsRich.desc: Fetch lyrics for the current track

name: ban
summary: Ban a member from the server.
description: Permanently bans a member. Supports an optional reason and message purge duration. The action is logged to your mod log channel if configured.

name: kick
summary: Remove a member without a permanent ban.
description: Kicks a member from the server. They can rejoin with a new invite. Reason is recorded in the mod log.

name: warn
summary: Issue a formal warning to a member.
description: Records a warning against a member. Warnings are visible to moderators via /warnings and can be cleared with /clearwarns.

name: purge
summary: Bulk-delete messages with filters.
description: Deletes up to 100 messages at once. Filter by user, bots, content match, or attachments. Shows a confirmation before deleting so you don't nuke the wrong thing.

name: timeout
summary: Temporarily mute a member.
description: Times out a member for a set duration. They can't send messages, join voice, or react until the timeout expires. Reason is logged.

name: lock
summary: Lock the current channel so only mods can post.
description: Removes the Send Messages permission for @everyone in the current channel. Use /unlock to reverse.

name: unlock
summary: Restore posting access to a locked channel.
description: Re-grants Send Messages to @everyone in the channel. Pair with /lock for quick channel control during incidents.

name: softban
summary: Kick a member and delete their recent messages.
description: Bans and immediately unbans a member, which removes their recent messages without a permanent ban. Useful for cleaning up spam without a long-term action.

name: unban
summary: Lift a ban by user ID.
description: Unbans a previously banned user by their Discord ID. The user can rejoin the server once unbanned.

name: warnings
summary: See all active warnings for a member.
description: Lists every warning on record for the specified member, including the moderator who issued it and the reason.

name: clearwarns
summary: Remove all warnings from a member's record.
description: Wipes the warning history for a member. Useful after a cooling-off period or when warnings were issued in error.

name: nick
summary: Set or clear a member's server nickname.
description: Sets a custom display name for a member within the server. Leave the nickname blank to reset to their account username.

name: role
summary: Add or remove a role from a member.
description: Assigns or removes a specified role from a member. Supports bulk operations and logs the change if mod logging is configured.

name: slowmode
summary: Rate-limit messages in a channel.
description: Sets a per-user cooldown on sending messages. Use 0 to disable. Helpful during active events or when a channel gets spammy.

name: modlogs
summary: Configure where mod actions get logged.
description: Sets the channel where bans, kicks, warns, timeouts, and other mod actions are posted. Keeps your moderation auditable.

name: balance
summary: Check your wallet and bank balance.
description: Displays your current credit balance split between your wallet (spendable) and bank (stored). Credits are earned through daily claims, working, quests, and other activities.

name: daily
summary: Claim your daily credit reward.
description: Awards a credit bonus once every 24 hours. Streak bonuses apply the longer you claim consecutively.

name: work
summary: Do a job shift to earn credits (30 min cooldown).
description: Runs a random work scenario and pays out credits. Has a 30 minute cooldown per use.

name: pay
summary: Transfer credits to another member.
description: Sends credits from your wallet to another member's wallet. The amount must be in your current wallet balance.

name: bank
summary: Deposit or withdraw credits from your bank.
description: Move credits between your wallet and bank. Banked credits are safe but can't be spent directly — withdraw first.

name: shop
summary: Buy tools and consumables with credits.
description: Displays the server shop. Purchase tools for gathering runs, consumables, or special items. Prices are set per server.

name: inventory
summary: View everything you own.
description: Lists all items in your inventory with quantities. Items are acquired through gathering, crafting, purchases, and drops.

name: leaderboard
summary: See who's on top across credits, XP, and more.
description: Shows server-wide rankings for credits, XP, collection completeness, and other stats. Competitive bragging rights.

name: 8ball
summary: Ask the magic 8-ball anything.
description: Pose a yes/no question and get an appropriately ambiguous answer. Pure chaos.

name: coinflip
summary: Heads or tails.
description: Flips a coin. That's it.

name: roll
summary: Roll a die with any number of sides.
description: Rolls a die and returns the result. Default is d6. Supports any polyhedral (e.g., d20, d100).

name: choose
summary: Can't decide? Pick from a list.
description: Randomly picks one item from the options you provide. Useful for settling debates or making decisions nobody wants to make.

name: trivia
summary: Play trivia solo, versus others, or against agents.
description: Multiplayer trivia with categories, solo play, and competitive modes. Challenge an AI agent from the pool for a head-to-head match, or enter your server's pool agents into cross-server competitions. Earning credits for wins ties directly into the economy system.

subcommandsRich.name: start
subcommandsRich.desc: Start a trivia session in the channel (solo or multiplayer)

subcommandsRich.name: category
subcommandsRich.desc: Filter by topic: Science, History, Gaming, Sports, and more

subcommandsRich.name: vs-agent
subcommandsRich.desc: Challenge an AI agent from the pool to a competitive trivia match

name: fight
summary: Battle encounters for XP, credits, and loot (10 min cooldown).
description: Starts a combat encounter at your chosen difficulty. Win to earn XP, credits, and item drops. Lose and walk away empty. 10 minute cooldown.

name: gather
summary: Run a gather mission to find collectible loot (5 min cooldown).
description: Sends you on a gathering run. Better tools from the shop increase your haul. Items collected go into your inventory and count toward your collection.

name: craft
summary: Craft new items from your inventory.
description: Opens an interactive crafting panel. Select a recipe, confirm you have the ingredients, and craft the item. Recipes are discovered as you collect materials.

name: quests
summary: View and complete daily quests for bonus rewards.
description: Shows your active daily quests with progress. Complete them before reset to claim XP and credit bonuses. Quests rotate every 24 hours.

name: fun
summary: 200+ random fun interactions.
description: Runs a random fun action — slap, hug, highfive, and hundreds more. Unpredictable, occasionally chaotic, always harmless.

name: giveaway
summary: Run a simple giveaway in any channel.
description: Starts a timed giveaway. Members react to enter. When time's up, a winner is picked at random and announced.

name: collection
summary: Browse everything you've gathered and collected.
description: Shows your full collection organized by rarity. Track what you have, what you're missing, and how close you are to completing sets.

name: vault
summary: Show off your rarest finds.
description: Displays a curated showcase of your rarest collected items. A flex command.

name: setup
summary: Guided wizard to configure key bot modules.
description: The master configuration command for your server. Controls mod log channel, mod roles, agent pool configuration, economy settings, raid/nuke protection thresholds, dynamic voice channel creation, welcome messages, and auto-roles. Run /setup once when you add Chopsticks — everything else flows from here.

subcommandsRich.name: modlog
subcommandsRich.desc: Set the channel for moderation action logs

subcommandsRich.name: modrole
subcommandsRich.desc: Designate one or more moderator roles

subcommandsRich.name: agent-pool
subcommandsRich.desc: Configure agent pool access, costs, and allowed actions

subcommandsRich.name: economy
subcommandsRich.desc: Enable/disable economy and set starting balance

subcommandsRich.name: welcome
subcommandsRich.desc: Configure the welcome message and channel

subcommandsRich.name: autorole
subcommandsRich.desc: Set roles granted automatically on join

subcommandsRich.name: protection
subcommandsRich.desc: Configure raid/nuke detection thresholds and auto-response

subcommandsRich.name: voicechannel
subcommandsRich.desc: Configure dynamic VC creation for members

name: automations
summary: Trigger scripts automatically on server events.
description: Configure event-triggered automations — run a sequence when someone joins, leaves, boosts, reaches a level, or any other server event. Automations can call scripts, assign roles, send messages, update economy values, or dispatch agents. Build complex server logic without writing code.

subcommandsRich.name: add
subcommandsRich.desc: Create a new trigger → action automation

subcommandsRich.name: list
subcommandsRich.desc: View all configured automations

subcommandsRich.name: remove
subcommandsRich.desc: Delete an automation by ID

name: autorole
summary: Automatically assign roles when members join.
description: Sets one or more roles that are automatically given to every new member. Works immediately on join, no manual review needed.

name: reactionroles
summary: Let members self-assign roles with emoji reactions.
description: Configure a message where members react with an emoji to gain a role and unreact to remove it. Supports exclusive (pick-one) and multi-select modes.

name: tickets
summary: Private support ticket system with transcripts.
description: Sends a ticket panel to a channel. Members click to open a private channel with staff. Tickets are auto-archived and a full transcript is saved on close.

subcommandsRich.name: panel
subcommandsRich.desc: Post the ticket creation panel to a channel

subcommandsRich.name: close
subcommandsRich.desc: Close and archive the current ticket

subcommandsRich.name: add
subcommandsRich.desc: Add a member to the current ticket channel

subcommandsRich.name: remove
subcommandsRich.desc: Remove a member from the current ticket channel

name: poll
summary: Create a quick poll with multiple options.
description: Posts an embedded poll that members vote on with reactions. Supports up to 10 options. Results show in real time.

name: remind
summary: Set a personal reminder.
description: Sends you a DM or channel ping after the specified duration. Useful for anything you don't want to forget mid-conversation.

name: levels
summary: Configure XP level rewards and progression.
description: Set up roles or messages that are automatically granted when a member reaches a certain XP level. Rewards active participation.

name: custom
summary: Create server-specific slash commands.
description: Build your own commands with custom names and responses. Supports static text responses and scripted actions.

name: starboard
summary: Highlight your best messages automatically.
description: When a message gets enough star reactions, Chopsticks reposts it in your designated starboard channel. Configure the threshold and which channel to post to.

name: welcome
summary: Customize your new-member welcome message.
description: Configure a rich welcome message that fires when someone joins. Supports custom text, embeds, and variable substitution (member name, server name, etc.).

name: scripts
summary: Write and run safe automation scripts.
description: Build fully programmable server automations with named scripts. Scripts can chain commands, reference variables, trigger conditionally, and be called by other automations or custom commands. The most powerful programmability tool in Chopsticks — turns the bot into a configurable server platform.

subcommandsRich.name: create
subcommandsRich.desc: Write a reusable script with commands and logic

subcommandsRich.name: run
subcommandsRich.desc: Execute a named script manually

subcommandsRich.name: list
subcommandsRich.desc: List all scripts configured for this server

subcommandsRich.name: delete
subcommandsRich.desc: Delete a script by name

name: macro
summary: Create shorthand command aliases.
description: Defines a short text alias that expands to a longer command when typed. Saves repetitive input for common actions.

name: agent
summary: Chat with a deployed AI agent.
description: Deploy a worker from the community Agent Pool to your server. Agents are near-human configurable actors — give them a persona, assign them to a voice channel, have them read documents aloud, compete in trivia against your members, join cross-server pool competitions, or bind them permanently to a channel as a support bot, lobby host, or greeter. Funded by server credits.

subcommandsRich.name: join
subcommandsRich.desc: Deploy an agent from the pool to your voice channel

subcommandsRich.name: leave
subcommandsRich.desc: Dismiss the active agent and end the session

subcommandsRich.name: chat
subcommandsRich.desc: Open a conversation with the active agent

subcommandsRich.name: style
subcommandsRich.desc: Configure the agent's persona, tone, and behavior

subcommandsRich.name: public
subcommandsRich.desc: Register your agent for cross-server pool competitions

subcommandsRich.name: read
subcommandsRich.desc: Have the agent read a document, story, or text aloud in VC

subcommandsRich.name: voice
subcommandsRich.desc: Configure voice type, accent, and speech style for TTS

subcommandsRich.name: assign
subcommandsRich.desc: Permanently assign an agent role to a channel

name: assistant
summary: Voice assistant for active agent sessions.
description: Activates voice assistant mode for an agent in a voice channel. The agent listens and responds in real time. Use /assistant bind to permanently assign an agent to a channel — for customer support, lobby music, onboarding, or any always-on role. Sessions are funded by server credits.

subcommandsRich.name: start
subcommandsRich.desc: Activate voice assistant mode in the current channel

subcommandsRich.name: stop
subcommandsRich.desc: Deactivate the voice assistant and end the session

subcommandsRich.name: bind
subcommandsRich.desc: Permanently bind an AI agent to a channel (support, lobby music, greeter)

name: ping
summary: Check bot latency.
description: Returns current API and WebSocket latency. Useful for diagnosing response delays.

name: help
summary: Open the Chopsticks help center.
description: Shows an overview of available command categories and links to the full documentation. Good starting point for new members.

name: avatar
summary: Pull up any member's avatar.
description: Displays the full-size avatar for a member, including their guild-specific avatar if set.

name: serverinfo
summary: Server stats at a glance.
description: Displays the server name, member count, owner, creation date, boost level, and other useful server metadata.

name: roleinfo
summary: Details about a specific role.
description: Shows a role's color, ID, member count, permissions, and whether it's mentionable or hoisted.

name: userinfo
summary: Profile and account details for any member.
description: Displays a member's account creation date, server join date, roles, and current status.

name: profile
summary: View your server profile and stats.
description: Shows your level, XP, credit balance, equipped items, and privacy settings. Manage what others can see about your profile.

name: invite
summary: Get a link to add Chopsticks to a server.
description: Returns the bot invite link with the required permissions pre-filled.
